person.persName: Alexander Smith (Washington Co, Kentucky, farm laborer and captain 1st KY Cav (Co. "I") USA)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Stephen Smith and Margaret Smith. Student in Washington County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm laborer in Mackville in 1860. Resident of Springfield, Kentucky. Served in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment as first (orderly) sergeant and captain from October 28, 1861, to February 13, 1864. Dismissed from service after being found guilty of disobedience of orders at court martial.
